Radish Boy: Oh, good evening mayor! Why are you outside so late at night?
Mayor: *cough* *cough* I would say the same to you young lad! Anyways, I'm practicing my workout routine.
*cough* *cough* You see those bushes there? I'll burrow myself underground to pass through, and then unburrow myself out.
It's a good workout! And it keeps you hidden from bugs. Oh, I know! Why don't you give it a try too?
